entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight then becoming light overnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023
